reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Closing gaps to reduce the incidence of HIV and AIDS-related deaths

description.narrative: Paraguay - HIV - Centro de Información y Recursos para el Desarrollo - CIRD. This program has the following goals: Disminuir la incidencia y la mortalidad relacionadas al VIH/sida, en el marco del respeto de los derechos humanos en Paraguay / Reduce HIV/AIDS incidence and mortality, based on the framework of respect for human rights in Paraguay. The objectives of this program are: Aumentar el acceso equitativo y la cobertura de las intervenciones para la prevención combinada de la infección de VIH en grupos de población clave / Increase equitable access and coverage of interventions for prevention of HIV in key population groups;. Eliminar la transmisión materno-infantil del VIH y la Sífilis / Eliminate mother-to-child transmission of HIV and Syphilis;. Incrementar el acceso a los sistemas de salud para el diagnóstico, la adherencia terapéutica de las personas que viven con el VIH/SIDA, y la supresión viral / Increase access to health systems for diagnostics, adherence to treatment for people living with HIV / AIDS, and viral suppression;. Fomentar el desarrollo de entornos favorables de manera intersectorial mediante una gestión coordinada de instituciones públicas y privadas para brindar apoyo a las poblaciones afectadas por el VIH y en situación de vulnerabilidad / Encourage the development of enabling environments across sectors through coordination across public and private institutions providing support to populations affected by and vulnerable to HIV. Potenciar el sistema de monitoreo, vigilancia e información que permita diseñar políticas de salud, monitorearlas y hacer una evaluación de las mismas / Strengthen the monitoring, surveillance and information system in order to inform designing of health policies, monitoring and evaluation;. Diseñar, implementar y evaluar intervenciones efectivas para incidir en la defensa de derechos de personas viviendo y conviviendo con el VIH y otras ITS / Design, implement and evaluate effective interventions to contribute to denfing the rights of people living with or affected by HIV and other STIs;

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for PRY-H-CIRD
Percentage of new HIV-positive patients starting IPT during the reporting period
Percentage of health facilities dispensing antiretroviral therapy that experienced a stock-out of at least one required antiretroviral drug in the last 12 month
Percentage of eligible men who have sex with men who initiated oral antiretroviral PrEP during the reporting period
Percentage of people newly diagnosed with HIV initiated on ART
Percentage of HIV-positive registered TB patients given anti-retroviral therapy during TB treatment
Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
HTS - Other 2 Percentage of HIV positive results among the total HIV tests carried out on Trans people in the regions intervened by the grant during the reporting period
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of TG reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
TCS- Other 2: Percentage of adult and children living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of TG that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of transgender people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HIV-positive patients who were screened for TB in HIV care or treatment settings
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of transgender people reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
HTS-Other 1 Percentage of HIV positive results among the total HIV tests performed on MSM in the regions intervened by the grant during the reporting period
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
TCS- Other 1:Percentage of adult and children living with HIV enrolled in HIV care and support at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
HTS - Other 3 Percentage of positive / reactive HIV results among total HIV tests performed on sex workers in regions targeted by the grant during the reporting period
Percentage of HMIS or other routine reporting units submitting timely reports according to national guidelines
Percentage of people on ART among all people living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Impact indicator for PRY-H-CIRD
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of transgender people who are living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Outcome indicator for PRY-H-CIRD
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of transgender people reporting using a condom in their last anal sex with a non-regular male partner
Percentage of transgender people reporting using a condom in their most recent sexual intercourse or anal sex
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
